Player History
Released by Atlanta on 4/8/1972...
Injured on 6/15/1978 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/12/1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1979, winning 2 games with a 1.00 ERA...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1979, going 18-14, 4.09 ERA...
Injured on 4/2/1985 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 9/19/1987 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1988, going 5-0, 1.75...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/21/1988 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/6/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $11,490,000 per year...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
